docs.snippet: Rare film footage featuring President Franklin D. Roosevelt walking to his seat at a baseball game helps dispel the myth that he completely hid his disability and shows the courage it took to go about his daily life, experts said Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rare film footage featuring President Franklin D. Roosevelt walking to his seat at a baseball game helps dispel the myth that he completely hid his disability and shows the courage it took to go about his daily life, experts said Friday.

headline.main: Rare Footage Shows 'Brave Struggle' of FDR Walking
headline.print_headline: Rare Footage Shows 'Brave Struggle' of FDR Walking

docs.snippet: Drew Hutchison outdueled Yu Darvish and Melky Cabrera hit a two-run double in the eighth inning to lift the Toronto Blue Jays to a 2-0 win over the Texas Rangers on Friday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Drew Hutchison outdueled Yu Darvish and Melky Cabrera hit a two-run double in the eighth inning to lift the Toronto Blue Jays to a 2-0 win over the Texas Rangers on Friday night.

headline.main: Cabrera Lifts Blue Jays to 2-0 Win Over Rangers
headline.print_headline: Cabrera Lifts Blue Jays to 2-0 Win Over Rangers

docs.snippet: A family's cat captured in a viral video saving a Central California boy from a dog attack has another challenge ahead, but this time from the pitcher's mound....
docs.lead_paragraph: A family's cat captured in a viral video saving a Central California boy from a dog attack has another challenge ahead, but this time from the pitcher's mound.

headline.main: Hero Cat That Saved Boy Takes the Pitcher's Mound
headline.print_headline: Hero Cat That Saved Boy Takes the Pitcher's Mound

docs.snippet: Long on the soccer sidelines, more and more South American women are striking back by lacing up their boots and embracing the region's most cherished sport....
docs.lead_paragraph: Long on the soccer sidelines, more and more South American women are striking back by lacing up their boots and embracing the region's most cherished sport.

headline.main: South American Women Emerge to Embrace Beautiful Game
headline.print_headline: South American Women Emerge to Embrace Beautiful Game

docs.snippet: Mr. Patton, a five-time N.C.A.A. champion at U.S.C., won the 200 meters and anchored the team that won the 4x100-meter relay at the London Games in 1948....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Patton, a five-time N.C.A.A. champion at U.S.C., won the 200 meters and anchored the team that won the 4x100-meter relay at the London Games in 1948.
docs.abstract: Mel Patton, who overcame shattered leg as child to win two sprinting gold medals in 1948 London Olympics, dies at age 89.

headline.main: Mel Patton, 89, Who Shattered a Leg and Then Sprinting Records, Is Dead
headline.print_headline: Mel Patton, 89, Who Shattered a Leg and Then Sprinting Records, Is Dead
